info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: This component will read an input CSV file and anonymize specified column(s). This component differs from the AnonymizeStandalone component in that it will keep a version of the input file on the server. As such, the output, with anonymized data, is then available for use in downstream components.
info.options:
Upload CSV File - the CSV file containing column(s) to be anonymized
Column(s) to Hash - the column(s) to be anonymized
(Optional) File Name - the name of the output file.
Secret Word - the salt value to use in the anonymization
